name: Quarks PwDump Usage
description: Detects usage of the Quarks PwDump tool via commandline arguments
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Qq][Uu][Aa][Rr][Kk][Ss][Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.command_line:(/\ \-[Dd][Hh][Ll]/ OR /\ \-\-[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\-[Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\-[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]/ OR /\ \-[Dd][Hh][Dd][Cc]/ OR /\ \-\-[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\-[Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn]\-[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd]/ OR /\ \-\-[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\-[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ee][Rr]/ OR /\ \-[Dd][Hh][Dd]\ / OR /\ \-\-[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp]\-[Hh][Aa][Ss][Hh]\-[Dd][Oo][Mm][Aa][Ii][Nn]\ / OR /\-\-[Nn][Tt][Dd][Ss]\-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\QuarksPwDump.exe OR process.command_line:(\ \-dhl OR \ \-\-dump\-hash\-local OR \ \-dhdc OR \ \-\-dump\-hash\-domain\-cached OR \ \-\-dump\-bitlocker OR \ \-dhd\  OR \ \-\-dump\-hash\-domain\  OR \-\-ntds\-file))`
